channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Deep pothole on Painswick Road(towards Painswick)., 2nd April
item.description:
Painswick Road entrance to Shell Garage. Been there for weeks but is getting bigger. Smaller one just behind it too.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Painswick Road, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: There are at least 20 potholes in this end of Malden Road.The road is a health hazard for anyone walking down it., 2nd April
item.description:
The potholes extend the full length of Malden Road from central cross drive northwards towards no.90. The road is uneven and dangerous. At night it is very dark and impossible to see all the holes.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 81, Malden Road, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Severe damage to grass verge caused by council grass cutters., 2nd April
item.description:
Grass verge near zebra crossing on North Upton Lane.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): North Upton Lane, Hucclecote, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damaged kerb due to vehicle usage, 2nd April
item.description:
The kerb is damaged due to vehicles illegally crossing the pavement, made worse following poor repair and tarmacing
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Park Avenue, Longlevens, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Poor repair leaving uneven surface, 2nd April
item.description:
A previous repair by the water company has left a depression causing member or public to trip
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Park Avenue, Longlevens, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: The sign is illegible problem, 2nd April
item.description:
email rec 18/03/2024 -Hello, I'm hoping to get someone who can quickly check and approve our proposed temporary road sign designs. The signs are designed to be 90cm x 40cm, which matches the dimensions of the existing signs currently mounted on the sign post at the end of Mottorshead drive where the signs will go. Once we have approval, we can proceed with the application process. Thanks in advance,
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lage hole in pavement, 2nd April
item.description:
Large hole in pavement causing trip hazard and damage to cars

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Cheltenham Road, Longlevens, Gloucester

item.title: Very deep pot hold danger to cars and pedestrians, 2nd April
item.description:
Large pothole on pavement on entrance to caraprk so damages to car as well as trip hazard

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Cheltenham Road, Longlevens, Gloucester

item.title: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles problem, 2nd April
item.description:
Perm lights was at 06:30 This morning and the police have just called us to make us ware that the lights have been hit and the light column has been knocked down and wires are exposed.
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles
